measured_by: 16-item cued odour identification subtest of the Sniffin' Sticks
justification: "They were tested for smell dysfunction with the 16-item cued odour identification subtest of the Sniffin' Sticks (Hummel et al., 1997) with an inclusion cutoff of 11 correct identifications."

measured_by: taste sprays for sweet, sour, salty and bitter
justification: "Taste identification was assessed based on taste sprays for sweet, sour, salty and bitter, where all needed to be labelled correctly (Vennemann et al., 2008)."

measured_by: Visual Analogue Scale (0-100, "How hungry are you right now?")
justification: "The effectiveness of the hunger manipulation was assessed with the help of visual analogue scales (VAS; "How hungry are you right now?"), ranging from 0 ("Not at all") to 100 ("Hungriest I have ever been")."
